get

public final DbHandle get(java.lang.String dbName,
                          java.lang.Boolean timestamped,
                          java.lang.String dbMarkerId)
Get (opening if needed) a handle to a database (by name) within this instance's environment.

If the types of keys (string -vs- long) are to be auto-detected, then by convention, dbNames for databases with long keys should end in "_id"; otherwise, the default assumption of the key type will be 'string'.

If timestamped is null, then if the database exists timestamped will be inferred by the existence of a timestamped database; otherwise, the new database will be opened WITHOUT a timestamped database (by default).

get

public final DbHandle get(java.lang.String dbName,
                          java.lang.Boolean timestamped)

listDatabaseNames

public final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> listDatabaseNames()
Get a list of all databases retrieved from this instance.

Returns:
the database names or null if none have been retrieved.

getAllDbHandles

public final java.util.Collection<DbHandle> getAllDbHandles()
Get all dbHandles retrieved through this instance.

Returns:
the dbHandles or null if none have been retrieved.

isClosed

public boolean isClosed()
Determine whether this instance has been closed.

close

public void close()
Close all of this instance's databases and environment.

Note that individual databases can be closed separately through their dbHandle acquired when retrieved through 'get'.

remove

void remove(DbHandle dbHandle)
